params.amountADesired: the amount of tokenA users want to add to the pool
params.amountAMin: bounds to the extents to which amountB/amountA can go up
params.amountBDesired: the amount of tokenB users want to add to the pool
params.amountBMin: bounds to the extents to which amountB/amountA can go down
params.deadline: Unix timestamp after which the transaction will revert.
params.tokenA: address of token in the pool
params.tokenB: address of token in the pool
params.vReserveRatioBounds: bounds to the extents to which vReserveB/vReserveA can go (precision: 2 ** 112)

params.amountETHMin: bounds to the extents to which WETH/token can go down
params.amountTokenDesired: the amount of token users want to add to the pool
params.amountTokenMin: bounds to the extents to which WETH/token can go up
params.deadline: Unix timestamp after which the transaction will revert.
params.token: address of token in the pool
params.vReserveRatioBounds: bounds to the extents to which vReserveB/vReserveA can go (precision: 2 ** 112)

params.amountA: amount of 1 side token added to the pool

returns.amountB: amount of the other token added to the pool

params.amountAMin: the minimum token retuned after burning
params.amountBMin: the minimum token retuned after burning

params.liquidity: the amount of lp token users want to burn
